snippet: A veteran House Republican from Georgia told a group in suburban Atlanta that the former Republican senatorial candidate Todd Akin of Missouri was "partially right" when he said that women do not become pregnant when raped.
abstract: A veteran House Republican from Georgia told a group in suburban Atlanta that the former Republican senatorial candidate Todd Akin of Missouri was "partially right" when he said that women do not become pregnant when raped.

headline.main: Republican Says Akin Was 'Partially Right' About Rape
